pkgmetadata.longdescription: Myers diff of two lists or files---------------------------------Inspired byhttps://gist.github.com/adamnew123456/37923cf53f51d6b9af32a539cdfa7cc4API===``myers.diff(a, b, context=None, format=None)``~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~(`myers.py, 25-60 <https://github.com/rec/myers/blob/master/myers.py#L25-L60>`_)Return the Myers diff of two lists.The result is a list of (action, line) pairs,where ``action`` is one of ``KEEP``, ``INSERT``, ``REMOVE``, or ``OMIT``(which happen to be the characters k, i, r, and o).ARGUMENTS: ``a``, ``b``: The two files to compare ``context``: How many lines of context to keep between blocks of changes? ``None``, the default, means keep all unchanged lines. ``0`` means throw away all the unchanged lines. ``format``: If a dictionary, it is used to format each diff entry. If true, the default dictionary above is used to format the diff entries. Otherwise they are returned as-is.(automatically generated by `doks <https://github.com/rec/doks/>`_ on 2020-11-07T12:19:33.047064)
